title: Krystal Ball and Saagar Enjeti on Bipartisan Elitism, Plus a Treasure Trove of 'Stoned Moments'
description:
Krystal Ball and Saagar Enjeti, co-hosts of the popular show Rising on the Hill, join the show to discuss themes from their book ‘The Populist’s Guide to 2020,’ democrats and republicans co-existing, Mike Bloomberg’s campaign and more.
*Merch Link Here!*: https://teespring.com/stores/useful-idiots
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
